name: Video Pool
overview: Welcome to Video Pool, a simulation highlighter of the popular game. Among its advantages are the discretionary and flickering movement of the ball and the true game angles. To win, you must enter as many of the five initial numbered balls as possible without lose lives Play is easy. A cursor (a bright cross) is moved along the bands of the table, and when a player makes a pitch the cue is automatically directed To the cross For each ball that enters you will be given a few points, except if it is an indicator ball, in whose Case is penalized. To calculate the number of points earned for each ball, you have to multiply by ten the number of difficulty, the number of the ball and the number of the embrasure. The ball must be entered before the shot count reaches zero (edge greater than the right). A warning signal will sound before the last shot, if after five shots the ball fails, He loses one of his three lives. Failure to hit a ball or hit the auxiliary ball are penalized actions, and lose a life To start the game, tap the P of the initial list
